website_summaries.verdict: A simple and reliable bed canopy for those wanting a clean look and affordable price.
pros: Comes with all the accessories buyers need to hang the product
Fits all beds up to queen-size
Customers were surprised how full and sleek this simple canopy looked despite its lightweight design
Extremely high-quality canopy when compared to the inexpensive price
cons: A few buyers complained that the ring the canopy hangs from is a little flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love!! This makes my room look so cute ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love!! This makes my room look so cute and feel extra cozy/comfortable. I'm so happy that I got it 😍 For reference I have a full size mattress and my mattress (including the box spring right under it) is about 15 inches off of the floor and the curtain can reach all around my bed with extra room to lay on the floor. It's absolutely perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful touch for those of all ages
customer_reviews.text: This item is easy to install, and was very easy for me to color match to my blanket. Take note that their is no wooden ring to support the canopy like some. It is supported, but easy to move around as a result. I am very happy with it, and it was worth the long search to find the best one.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the photos. 9 yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 9yr olds twin bed. She loves it! Seems like it will rip extremely easily but for the price compared to most other ones that are really expensive it doesn't really matter. Opening is only on one side so more of a mosquito net than a 4 corners canopy- just like the pics. I added a set of battery operated LED Star lights (just set them on top) for the perfect princess bed. :)
customer_reviews.author: Shelly A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent privacy and romance product.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this on Amazon, I thought to myself, that would make an excellent addition to our house. When it showed up, I went to hang it in the bedroom and pulled a chunk of ceiling down on me(my fault, not the products). Well now what? I had an Ah Ha moment. Hang it over the toilet. Why not? You get romance and privacy, and if you happen to run out of toilet paper, you have something to use instead of your shirt or sock. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: nancyben

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! I got this to add some elegance to my guest bedroom. I have two similar ones in my grandchildren's room but they were more expensive so I wasn't expecting to be too thrilled. I was wrong! It's truly lovely and if the same quality of the more expensive ones. And the color was perfect. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not the highest quality, but not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. She loved it while it lasted. She's very creative and often deconstructs things to turn them into something else. So it went about 7 months before she started cutting it up. It's pretty much gone now (I still find scraps every once in a while) but she loved it while it lasted. I personally liked how soft it was.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Just not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying online for fear the holes wouldnt be small enough. I have midges (which are so small you cant see them with the naked eye). The canopy itself is nice but yes, the holes are too big. I slept last night with it up but still got bit while sleeping. I wish more advertisers would disclose how any holes per inch. I will be on the hunt again for a net with smaller holes.
customer_reviews.author: Stwy2Heavn

customer_reviews.title: Nice for daughter's bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice addition to my daughter's room. It was easy to hang, and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to take my daughters pictures with. It was super cute hanging from a tree outside! We also put it up over her bed and she loves it! It is very delicate so it can rip/tear easily but it gets pulled on Alot and still hanging up well. Definitely happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Buggieloo

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter's bed and was well pleased with the material that was used
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's bed and was well pleased with the material that was used . it is lightweight and extremely durable. Very simple to install with minimal tools and the color is exactly what was ordered. Had no issues installing and was satisfied with the extremely fast response by the maker with any questions I had.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Shaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not pratical
customer_reviews.text: There were very pretty, but my kiddos torn them down in the first week. They are not overly rough, but just accidentally sitting on them and tugging them in their sleep was enough to have them crashing down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, and it's super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for my 11 year old daughter and she was thrilled with it. She even set it up completely by herself, and after my husband inspected her handiwork he declared that she'd done an excellent job. It seems to be made well, and of decent materials.
customer_reviews.author: MeLissa

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant because of the price. I didn’t want the canopy to look cheap. I was actually pleasantly surprised. It arrived super fast, easy to install, and my daughter loves It. My son ‘accidentally’ sat on It (typical boys) and It came out of the ceiling so i would suggest using the plastic reinforcement they provide when installing. Highly suggest this buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The metal ring cane undone so I had to clamp it back together... Tears easily. However, I don't expect things to last in a small childs room..ever.. So id rather buy this to possibly be destroyed than spend good money on a bicer one. It does what I intended it to do.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Made a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an Xmas/housewarming gift for my 9 year old niece. She & her mom just moved to a new place closer to her school, and her mom downsized a lot of their stuff. I thought it'd make a nice gift cause I remember always wanting a cool bed canopy when I was a kid. She liked it well enough when she opened it. It made her smile pretty big. I hope it suits her well in her new room.
customer_reviews.author: ThePoptartFox

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's cute enough, but I ordered purple and it looks very pink. I'll keep it cuz it's for my granddaughters play room at my house, but it's aggravating ordering off amazon and not getting what the heck you order!
customer_reviews.author: all4given1

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the shade of purple I thought it would be, but that could be the settings on my laptop! :-) It was more of a pink purple, than a lavender. Either way, it still matched my Granddaughter's comforter set. It's a great addition to her Princess carriage bed! She loves it! Typical durability for netting. Perfect for the price! Fast shipping! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Roni Renee

customer_reviews.title: I mught get one for me own bed
customer_reviews.text: This is cute. Got it for my daughter. It had a yucky smell when opened but after a couple hours airing out it went away. The material is very fragile and stuff gets caught in it and we've already got a couple little holes. No biggie though that's my fault not the manufacturers. Easy set up. No hassle there. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssaloo

customer_reviews.title: Made Granddaughter happy
customer_reviews.text: very cute and inexpensive - not liking the lace very much however they were easily cut off and didn't effect the looks, I actually put some bling around the top for my grandaughter and she just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lsilvia

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, we have this in our playroom and the purple looks great in there. I saw other reviews that said that the purple looked more pink but ours definitely appears purple.
customer_reviews.author: icanseecanada

customer_reviews.title: easy installation!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have read the fine print better but this canopy comes with the hook and anchor already so it was nice not having to go out and by hardware. This hangs over my youngest's toddler bed nicely from ceiling to floor it does not seems to be to long and easy to maneuver with the slit down the middle to adjust easily for my little one! The color looks great and fabric kept together nicely so far!
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure if my daughter would even like it, but at the price I figured why ...
customer_reviews.text: After looking at so many other styles, brands, and colors I decided to order this one. I wasn't sure if my daughter would even like it, but at the price I figured why not give it a try. It came with the hardware needed to hang it up. All I had to do was figure out where to hang it. It's very soft and fluffy and she absolutely loves it! She has a twin bed and it fits perfectly over it. Like I said, she loves it & we have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Adri Warner

customer_reviews.title: perfect & dreamy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, the lace is a fun accent that gives it a little personality. My 11 year old daughter absolutely adores how it looks over her bed. It is easy to tear if you snag it, so something to keep in mind but everything tulle/netting does
customer_reviews.author: S. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of length
customer_reviews.text: Good amount of length. I used this to contain balls over a ball pit that measured 63" x 63". The wite circle gets bent out of shape. And I never could get it back into the package for storage. Pay close attention how it is wrapped before taking it out and you might have more luck than I at getting it back into the bag. I dont allow my kids to step on it, as this would most likely cause it to rip.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D. McNett

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! I am so pleased with this.
customer_reviews.text: This bed canopy is perfect! You really can’t beat the price. I just put it up for my (almost) 5 year old, & she absolutely loves her “princess bed”! The material is very flimsy though so I would keep that in mind if you think your child is going to be yanking on it roughly.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, just what I wanted for my granddaughter's bed. She will love it. Great price, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Okie Gal

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a princess
customer_reviews.text: My daughter adores this canopy in her room. It was very easy to install. I am able to move it out of the way when cleaning. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: NICE... Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Love feeling like a princess (lol), thought it would be made a lot cheaper then what I received, seeing it was very cheap in price. Overall I am very happy with my purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, my daughter loves it. What I don't love about it is it seems to scream "climb on me", but that is my own parenting woes...the product is great :)
customer_reviews.author: Natalee Pfeifer

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this canopy for my daughters room I ordered it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this canopy for my daughters room I ordered it in purple and pink my daughters are 12 and 13 and They were tired of their Disney princess bedding They are still my princess regardless and I wanted to still keep that so these canopies were awesome I bought these back in November and they’ve lasted at least six months now they do not come with hardware I give it a five stars because I really love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: My son's leg was bited by mosquito and swollen a lot last week that why i bought the bed netting.the quality just normal but poor packing.My son's bed is full size,it's big enough and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like how advertised
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like how advertised. My future wife loves it. She's become inventive with how its hung. However the hanging hardware was not as advertised. They advertised a nice hook with two screws to hold it, what has delivered was a hook screw with a plastic wallsleve. Do sent effect it but thought yall should know.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this in less than 5 minutes and my 4 year old loved it. The color is beautiful and its looks great over my daughter's bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely canopy
customer_reviews.text: The gift was well received. She loved it. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in Reading Area
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken a better picture, but this is the canopy in my classroom last year! My kids LOVED their little reading area. I would recommend getting one or two of these for a classroom, children's bed, children's reading nook at home, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Princess vibes achieved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my little sisters’ room and they are absolutely perfect. Installation was so easy even I could do it and the material is durable despite its whispy appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Fancy!
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted me to order it for her friends baby shower. Im assuming everything went well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! I was afraid it would be too small, but it was just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: caro

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: The purple color is very bright in person. It's a purple-ish pink, not a true purple. It did come with a hook to hang it from the ceiling. Overall, we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Caffeinated Mombie

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The top came out to easily before I even put it up. I can’t put it back in either.
customer_reviews.author: Maisey Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty cheaply made BUT I think it is totally worth ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cheaply made BUT I think it is totally worth the money. I just don't know that it will last very long. I would recommend it to anyone that is looking for a decent canopy at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! Exactly what we thought it was when we ordered it. Incredibly easy to install! We got two for my girls & they couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Colver

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for a little kick back area I created in my niece's room. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ware

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't reflect the color right I ordered purple but it looks pink
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very well make its perfact side for all my daughters twin beds
customer_reviews.author: Rob Prentiss and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Princess Vibesss
customer_reviews.text: Had this for almost two years and I moved it so much I can’t even count! Still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: katisha

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good and probable I buy again specially for huracán maria my dad used a lot and means a lot for us still good and fit well
customer_reviews.author: Luz rosa

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty canopy. Actually a little prettier in person. With the cheap price I was expecting it to be a little low quality, but I actually love it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Excelled cheap princess netting for bed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter's princess bed. It's a good value, but I have concerns over it lasting a while.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly over a queen size bed. Very pretty blue color. I recommend this if you're looking for a bed canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Princess on training
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves purple and she’s the princess of the house. I surprised her with it
customer_reviews.author: Angelica maria mejia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a crib canopy for my baby’s nursery. It looks great! My ceilings are super high so it’s not as long as I would have wanted but the quality is great and it shipped on time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice net, great price
customer_reviews.text: It's a mosquito net, it appears it should work just fine, good price, nice product, only three stars because it is merely a mosquito net, cannot really "love" a mosquito net, unless it keeps me from getting malaria I suppose...
customer_reviews.author: Lubnut

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for each girls room. They look adorable but the “purple” is more of a pink purple. The pink is very light (lighter than the pic makes it seem), but looks great if you’re not looking for anything too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Yes, but it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It looks cheap, but when it arrived the quality is very good. Perfect for your little girl/boy.
customer_reviews.author: sai yang

customer_reviews.title: Love this one
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. Made my daughter even happier with her bed once this was above it. The only downfall was it's more on the pink side than purple and I ended up dying it to look more purple.
customer_reviews.author: SAMANTHA FONSECA

customer_reviews.title: slightly disappointed, but still making it work.
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose and I was able to mess around with this enough to make it look nice (I cut the wire circle out) but it seemed really cheap at first and looked so too... slightly disappointed, but still making it work.
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I thought it would be. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 6 yo new bedroom
customer_reviews.text: We hung ours above a full size bed with sleigh bed frame. Is wide enough to hang nicely around the bed frame/head board. Without having a head board this product may cause issues when the child sleeps and rolls around. Maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dainty & Classy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked out perfectly for my daughter’s nursery. I feel like it wouldn’t be so durable for an older child but it’ll work for now!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Lopez & Ali Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy, but my daughter loves it. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Not fancy, but my daughter loves it. I bought this because my daughter destroys everything and this was cheap. She loves it soooo much that it's still intact months after installing it.
customer_reviews.author: opelch

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I’m not super careful with it + have a dog that steps on it. It has a couple holes and the metal frame at the top is bent. It would definitely last longer if you’re more careful with it lol
customer_reviews.author: tyler orrego

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They purple color is more pink then I expected and the quality looks cheap. I think my daughter will still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Chassidy Meyer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really liked it and it's holding up pretty good. The price is excellent
customer_reviews.author: eliza_day

customer_reviews.title: once we hung it the wire completely lost its shape and now it just hangs like a sad sheet
customer_reviews.text: It arrived ok, once we took it out of the bag the wire came apart, once we hung it the wire completely lost its shape and now it just hangs like a sad sheet. It also came snagged and it ripped easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old loves this over her bed now she sleeps in her own bed and not mine!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zions Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not really purple
customer_reviews.text: It was really more pink than purple but other than that, it is beautiful and my daughter is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased several of these and I really like each of them
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these and I really like each of them. It's a bit short for a queen bed tho.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy 3 year old. This with some fairy lights completed the princess bed she was wanting!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. The screw/anchor was sort of a pain but overall this is very nice for a little girl's room
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Very sheer but still pretty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up very pretty just very thin I ended up buying fabric and attaching it to it
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Kent

customer_reviews.title: Came torn.
customer_reviews.text: Product came slightly torn at the top, mostly out of line of sight. The lace is beautiful around the hoop, but the netting is a little bulky and challenging to contain.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful! Instead of using the hook it came with I used a command hook because I can’t damage my walls. It worked just as well and it’s very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This netting is very cute esp for how much it was! I love it. Cats love it too 😫
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fun addition to our daughters room, I hung it with a command hook from the ceiling
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie M

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for any girl! I’ve bought two of these as gifts and they loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie A

customer_reviews.title: Received open package and item was dirty
customer_reviews.text: package was open when I received it. The lace at the top was dirty all around. I tried to wipe off the dirt which would not come off so now wondering if it has mold on it. Trying to return and having difficulties. Very pretty item if it wasn't damaged. Would not recommend buying from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela M Alldredge

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful! I love the lace on the top
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful! I love the lace on the top, I think I will put flower vines on top to give it an extra touch!
customer_reviews.author: Ken DenBesten

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I've put numerous holes in my wall because this won't stay. The metal ring keeps breaking apart. Waste of money. Throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Everything i expected. It was large enough to cover my baby's crib and it was long enough to touch my ceiling all the way to the roof. The hook it came with was study. Gives the room a classy look. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Itzayana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves it. Arrived fast and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Aerin Jordan Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but easily broken
customer_reviews.text: It broke almost as soon as I got it. The metal frame at the top is flimsy and breaks apart super easy. So just be careful and make sure you don’t own any destructive pets lol
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty canopy. It has a lace skirt at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Nayira

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came with hook to hang looks nice just what I wanted but had holes in it which sucks
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn G.

customer_reviews.title: These come in many colors!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it came with a small hook so you can install quickly!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughters bed for Xmas. Still up and hasn't ripped. She loves it

customer_reviews.text: 4 year old daughter loves it! Seems like okay quality.

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Got it fast. A good purchase for the cheap price cannot beat it

customer_reviews.title: -( but it is very pretty and a nice canopy
customer_reviews.text: Came in two days late, :-( but it is very pretty and a nice canopy

customer_reviews.text: Great price point and my daughter feels it is the perfect finishing touch to her bedroom.

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, great hoop
customer_reviews.text: A very large hoop that can be easily compacted into a smaller package for easy storage. I really love it and am hoping it'll add a little something extra to my photos.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is very delicate. After a month the metal ring came out

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and it looks adorable! She has a real “princess” bed.

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect all the way around! My daughter loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Amber Duty

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheaply made but it does the job and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheaply made but it does the job and we have cats so no sense in investing a lot until we see how they may react
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fast.  Shipping great quality canopy was gorgeous I love it
customer_reviews.text: This canopy was totally beautiful amazed when it arrived I was not expecting it to look so nice excellent quality perfect condition would recommend anyone to order from here
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, smelled really bad when opened
customer_reviews.text: I bought this canopy for my five year old daughter, and she didn't even want to keep it. Very cheaply made, and smelled horrible when I took it out of the box. This item was returned quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves her new "princess bed" Easy way to transform a room without buying new furniture
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Mosquitoes Out
customer_reviews.text: Good quality netting. Put up around baby crib to keep mosquitoes out. Works just fine. The purple is slightly pink IMO.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: It's big enough to cover a crib and a toddler bed so I can keep using it as my son gets older!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this canopy!! I did not realize the size of it till we opened it up but its exactly what we were looking for!! It fit the size of crip perfectly. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
